record.description: University of Chicago holds Homecoming without football. Satirical skits along with other frivolities, but no football, greet some 5,000 alumni returning to the campus today for the annual homecoming. Recalling scenes of yesteryear are Margery Brooks, Quadrangler, Punky Johnson, Sigma, and Marion McCarthy, Quadrangler, participate in "Victory Vanities."
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
